Curator's comments: Published in: F. Scalf, 'An embalmer's bowl with Demotic inscription (Oriental Institute Museum E9115)', in R.K. Ritner (ed.), Essays for the library of Seshat. Studies presented to Janet H. Johnson on the occasion of her 70th Birthday (SAOC 70), Chicago 2017, 311-23
To be included in a study of Demotic inscriptions from the French expedition (Mission égypto-française d’Atfih) in Atfih by Adrienn Almásy.
